body:
Fixed a bug I ran across in the Lmod package. Reported at https://github.com/TACC/Lmod/issues/271. Fixed in https://github.com/TACC/Lmod/commit/6dea3d8c6d1ec9dc279e0f1fbd9965e7cc774678

Also added the latest release which includes this change.
title: Add patch to fix missing MODULESHOME in profile
